subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox shortstop claims he does not follow in his brother J.D.’s footsteps, except that he wears a No.7 jersey and now has a Red Sox ring like him.
snippet: The Red Sox shortstop claims he does not follow in his brother J.D.’s footsteps, except that he wears a No.7 jersey and now has a Red Sox ring like him.
